entries.name: Barbarian
entries.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.

data.skillChoices: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival
data.startingEquipment: (a) a greataxe or (b) any martial melee weapon; (a) two handaxes or (b) any simple weapon; an explorer's pack and four javelins
data.features: Rage (2/day), Unarmored Defense, Reckless Attack, Danger Sense (3), Extra Attack (5), Fast Movement (5), Feral Instinct (7), Brutal Critical (9/13/17), Relentless Rage (11), Persistent Rage (15), Indomitable Might (18), Primal Champion (20)

levelProgression.3: Primal Path (Path of the Berserker), Rage (3/day)

data.subclassFeatures: Frenzy (3), Mindless Rage (6), Intimidating Presence (10), Retaliation (14)
data.description: For some, their rage springs from a communion with fierce animal spirits. Others draw from a roiling reservoir of anger at a world full of pain. For every barbarian, rage is a power that fuels not just a battle frenzy but also uncanny reflexes, resilience, and feats of strength.

entries.name: Bard
entries.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

data.weaponProficiencies: Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
data.toolProficiencies: Three musical instruments of your choice
data.startingEquipment: (a) a rapier, (b) a longsword, or (c) any simple weapon; (a) a diplomat's pack or (b) an entertainer's pack; (a) a lute or (b) any other musical instrument; leather armor and a dagger

spellcasting.cantripsKnown: 2 at 1st level, increasing to 4 at 10th level
spellcasting.spellsKnown: 4 at 1st level, increasing by 1 per level

data.features: Spellcasting, Bardic Inspiration (d6), Jack of All Trades (2), Song of Rest (d6) (2), Bard College (3), Expertise (3), Font of Inspiration (5), Countercharm (6), Magical Secrets (10/14/18), Superior Inspiration (20)

levelProgression.2: Jack of All Trades, Song of Rest (d6)

data.subclassFeatures: Bonus Proficiencies (3), Cutting Words (3), Additional Magical Secrets (6), Peerless Skill (14)
data.description: Whether scholar, skald, or scoundrel, a bard weaves magic through words and music to inspire allies, demoralize foes, manipulate minds, create illusions, and even heal wounds. The bard is a master of song, speech, and the magic they contain.

entries.name: Cleric
entries.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

data.skillChoices: Choose two from History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion
data.startingEquipment: (a) a mace or (b) a warhammer (if proficient); (a) scale mail, (b) leather armor, or (c) chain mail (if proficient); (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) any simple weapon; (a) a priest's pack or (b) an explorer's pack; a shield and a holy symbol

spellcasting.cantripsKnown: 3 at 1st level, increasing to 5 at 10th level
spellcasting.spellsKnown: Prepare spells from entire cleric spell list
spellcasting.domainSpells: Always prepared, don't count against prepared limit

data.features: Spellcasting, Divine Domain (1), Channel Divinity (2), Destroy Undead (5), Divine Intervention (10), Divine Strike or Potent Spellcasting (8)

levelProgression.8: Ability Score Improvement, Domain Feature (Divine Strike) or Potent Spellcasting, Destroy Undead (CR 1)

data.subclassFeatures: Bonus Proficiency (Heavy Armor), Disciple of Life (1), Channel Divinity: Preserve Life (2), Blessed Healer (6), Divine Strike (8), Supreme Healing (17)
data.description: Clerics are intermediaries between the mortal world and the distant planes of the gods. As varied as the gods they serve, clerics strive to embody the handiwork of their deities. No ordinary priest, a cleric is imbued with divine magic.

entries.name: Druid
entries.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

data.armorProficiencies: Light armor, medium armor, shields (druids will not wear armor or use shields made of metal)
data.weaponProficiencies: Clubs, daggers, darts, javelins, maces, quarterstaffs, scimitars, sickles, slings, spears
data.skillChoices: Choose two from Arcana, Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, and Survival
data.startingEquipment: (a) a wooden shield or (b) any simple weapon; (a) a scimitar or (b) any simple melee weapon; leather armor, an explorer's pack, and a druidic focus

spellcasting.cantripsKnown: 2 at 1st level, increasing to 4 at 10th level
spellcasting.spellsKnown: Prepare spells from entire druid spell list
spellcasting.circleSpells: Always prepared, don't count against prepared limit

data.features: Druidic (1), Spellcasting (1), Wild Shape (2), Druid Circle (2), Wild Shape Improvement (4/8), Timeless Body (18), Beast Spells (18), Archdruid (20)

levelProgression.2: Wild Shape, Druid Circle (Circle of the Land)
levelProgression.4: Wild Shape Improvement, Ability Score Improvement
levelProgression.8: Wild Shape Improvement, Ability Score Improvement

wildShapeProgression.2: Max CR 1/4, No flying or swimming speed
wildShapeProgression.20: Unlimited uses, can cast spells in Wild Shape

data.subclassFeatures: Bonus Cantrip (2), Natural Recovery (2), Circle Spells (3/5/7/9), Land's Stride (6), Nature's Ward (10), Nature's Sanctuary (14)

arctic.9: commune with nature, cone of cold

desert.5: create food and water, protection from energy

data.description: Whether calling on the elemental forces of nature or emulating the creatures of the animal world, druids are an embodiment of nature's resilience, cunning, and fury. They claim no mastery over nature. Instead, they see themselves as extensions of nature's indomitable will.

entries.name: Fighter
entries.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

data.skillChoices: Choose two from Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, and Survival
data.startingEquipment: (a) chain mail or (b) leather armor, longbow, and 20 arrows; (a) a martial weapon and a shield or (b) two martial weapons; (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) two handaxes; (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack
data.features: Fighting Style (1), Second Wind (1), Action Surge (2), Martial Archetype (3), Extra Attack (5), Indomitable (9)
data.fightingStyles: Archery, Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection, Two-Weapon Fighting
data.subclassFeatures: Improved Critical (3), Remarkable Athlete (7), Additional Fighting Style (10), Superior Critical (15), Survivor (18)
data.description: Fighters share an unparalleled mastery with weapons and armor, and a thorough knowledge of the skills of combat. They are well acquainted with death, both meting it out and staring it defiantly in the face.

entries.name: Monk
entries.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

data.toolProficiencies: Choose one type of artisan's tools or one musical instrument
data.skillChoices: Choose two from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, and Stealth
data.startingEquipment: (a) a shortsword or (b) any simple weapon; (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack; 10 darts
data.features: Unarmored Defense (1), Martial Arts (1), Ki (2), Unarmored Movement (2), Monastic Tradition (3), Deflect Missiles (3), Slow Fall (4), Extra Attack (5), Stunning Strike (5), Ki-Empowered Strikes (6), Evasion (7), Stillness of Mind (7), Purity of Body (10), Tongue of the Sun and Moon (13), Diamond Soul (14), Timeless Body (15), Empty Body (18), Perfect Self (20)

levelProgression.3: Monastic Tradition (Way of the Open Hand), Deflect Missiles
levelProgression.5: Extra Attack, Stunning Strike, Martial Arts (1d6)
levelProgression.6: Ki-Empowered Strikes, Tradition Feature (Wholeness of Body)
levelProgression.13: Tongue of the Sun and Moon

data.subclassFeatures: Open Hand Technique (3), Wholeness of Body (6), Tranquility (11), Quivering Palm (17)
data.description: Monks are united in their ability to magically harness the energy that flows in their bodies. Whether channeled as a striking display of combat prowess or a subtler focus of defensive ability and speed, this energy infuses all that a monk does.

entries.name: Paladin
entries.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

data.skillChoices: Choose two from Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion
data.startingEquipment: (a) a martial weapon and a shield or (b) two martial weapons; (a) five javelins or (b) any simple melee weapon; (a) a priest's pack or (b) an explorer's pack; chain mail and a holy symbol

spellcasting.spellsKnown: Prepare spells from paladin spell list
spellcasting.oathSpells: Always prepared, don't count against prepared limit

data.features: Divine Sense (1), Lay on Hands (1), Fighting Style (2), Spellcasting (2), Divine Smite (2), Divine Health (3), Sacred Oath (3), Channel Divinity (3), Aura of Protection (6), Aura of Courage (10), Improved Divine Smite (11), Cleansing Touch (14)

levelProgression.3: Divine Health, Sacred Oath (Oath of Devotion), Channel Divinity

data.fightingStyles: Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection
data.subclassFeatures: Oath Spells, Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon and Turn the Unholy (3), Aura of Devotion (7), Purity of Spirit (15), Holy Nimbus (20)

oathSpells.3: protection from evil and good, sanctuary
oathSpells.13: freedom of movement, guardian of faith

data.description: Whether sworn before a god's altar and the witness of a priest, in a sacred glade before nature spirits and fey beings, or in a moment of desperation and grief with the dead as the only witness, a paladin's oath is a powerful bond. It is a source of power that turns a devout warrior into a blessed champion.

entries.name: Ranger
entries.description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization.

data.skillChoices: Choose three from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
data.startingEquipment: (a) scale mail or (b) leather armor; (a) two shortswords or (b) two simple melee weapons; (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack; a longbow and a quiver of 20 arrows
data.features: Favored Enemy (1), Natural Explorer (1), Fighting Style (2), Spellcasting (2), Ranger Archetype (3), Primeval Awareness (3), Extra Attack (5), Land's Stride (8), Hide in Plain Sight (10), Vanish (14), Feral Senses (18), Foe Slayer (20)

levelProgression.6: Favored Enemy and Natural Explorer improvements
levelProgression.10: Natural Explorer improvement, Hide in Plain Sight

data.subclassFeatures: Hunter's Prey (3): Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker; Defensive Tactics (7): Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will; Multiattack (11): Volley or Whirlwind Attack; Superior Hunter's Defense (15): Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge
data.description: Far from the bustle of cities and towns, past the hedges that shelter the most distant farms from the terrors of the wild, amid the dense-packed trees of trackless forests and across wide and empty plains, rangers keep their unending watch.

entries.name: Rogue
entries.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

data.weaponProficiencies: Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
data.skillChoices: Choose four from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth
data.startingEquipment: (a) a rapier or (b) a shortsword; (a) a shortbow and quiver of 20 arrows or (b) a shortsword; (a) a burglar's pack, (b) a dungeoneer's pack, or (c) an explorer's pack; leather armor, two daggers, and thieves' tools
data.features: Expertise (1), Sneak Attack (1), Thieves' Cant (1), Cunning Action (2), Roguish Archetype (3), Uncanny Dodge (5), Evasion (7), Reliable Talent (11), Blindsense (14), Slippery Mind (15), Elusive (18), Stroke of Luck (20)

levelProgression.13: Archetype Feature (Use Magic Device), Sneak Attack (7d6)

data.subclassFeatures: Fast Hands (3), Second-Story Work (3), Supreme Sneak (9), Use Magic Device (13), Thief's Reflexes (17)
data.description: Rogues rely on skill, stealth, and their foes' vulnerabilities to get the upper hand in any situation. They have a knack for finding the solution to just about any problem, demonstrating resourcefulness and versatility that is the cornerstone of any successful adventuring party.

entries.name: Sorcerer
entries.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

data.weaponProficiencies: Daggers, darts, slings, quarterstaffs, light crossbows
data.skillChoices: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, and Religion
data.startingEquipment: (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) any simple weapon; (a) a component pouch or (b) an arcane focus; (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack; two daggers

spellcasting.cantripsKnown: 4 at 1st level, increasing to 6 at 10th level
spellcasting.spellsKnown: 2 at 1st level, increasing by level (can swap on level up)

data.features: Spellcasting (1), Sorcerous Origin (1), Font of Magic (2), Metamagic (3), Sorcerous Restoration (20)
data.metamagicOptions: Careful Spell, Distant Spell, Empowered Spell, Extended Spell, Heightened Spell, Quickened Spell, Subtle Spell, Twinned Spell
data.subclassFeatures: Dragon Ancestor (1), Draconic Resilience (1), Elemental Affinity (6), Dragon Wings (14), Draconic Presence (18)
data.draconicAncestorTypes: Black (acid), Blue (lightning), Brass (fire), Bronze (lightning), Copper (acid), Gold (fire), Green (poison), Red (fire), Silver (cold), White (cold)
data.description: Sorcerers carry a magical birthright conferred upon them by an exotic bloodline, some otherworldly influence, or exposure to unknown cosmic forces. No one chooses sorcery; the power chooses the sorcerer.

entries.name: Warlock
entries.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

data.skillChoices: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, and Religion
data.startingEquipment: (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) any simple weapon; (a) a component pouch or (b) an arcane focus; (a) a scholar's pack or (b) a dungeoneer's pack; leather armor, any simple weapon, and two daggers

spellcasting.cantripsKnown: 2 at 1st level, increasing to 4 at 10th level
spellcasting.spellsKnown: 2 at 1st level, increasing by level (can swap on level up)
spellcasting.spellSlots: Pact Magic - few slots but always at highest level, recover on short rest
spellcasting.expandedSpellList: Additional spells available based on patron

data.features: Otherworldly Patron (1), Pact Magic (1), Eldritch Invocations (2), Pact Boon (3), Mystic Arcanum (11/13/15/17), Eldritch Master (20)
data.pactBoons: Pact of the Chain, Pact of the Blade, Pact of the Tome
data.subclassFeatures: Expanded Spell List, Dark One's Blessing (1), Dark One's Own Luck (6), Fiendish Resilience (10), Hurl Through Hell (14)
data.eldritchInvocations: Agonizing Blast, Armor of Shadows, Ascendant Step, Beast Speech, Beguiling Influence, Bewitching Whispers, Book of Ancient Secrets, Chains of Carceri, Devil's Sight, Dreadful Word, Eldritch Sight, Eldritch Spear, Eyes of the Rune Keeper, Fiendish Vigor, Gaze of Two Minds, Lifedrinker, Mask of Many Faces, Master of Myriad Forms, Minions of Chaos, Mire the Mind, Misty Visions, One with Shadows, Otherworldly Leap, Repelling Blast, Sculptor of Flesh, Sign of Ill Omen, Thief of Five Fates, Thirsting Blade, Visions of Distant Realms, Voice of the Chain Master, Whispers of the Grave, Witch Sight
data.description: Warlocks are seekers of the knowledge that lies hidden in the fabric of the multiverse. Through pacts made with mysterious beings of supernatural power, warlocks unlock magical effects both subtle and spectacular.

entries.name: Wizard
entries.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

data.weaponProficiencies: Daggers, darts, slings, quarterstaffs, light crossbows
data.skillChoices: Choose two from Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, and Religion
data.startingEquipment: (a) a quarterstaff or (b) a dagger; (a) a component pouch or (b) an arcane focus; (a) a scholar's pack or (b) an explorer's pack; a spellbook

spellcasting.cantripsKnown: 3 at 1st level, increasing to 5 at 10th level
spellcasting.spellsKnown: Learn spells by copying into spellbook, prepare from spellbook
spellcasting.spellbook: Start with 6 1st-level spells, gain 2 per level

data.features: Spellcasting (1), Arcane Recovery (1), Arcane Tradition (2), Spell Mastery (18), Signature Spells (20)
data.subclassFeatures: Evocation Savant (2), Sculpt Spells (2), Potent Cantrip (6), Empowered Evocation (10), Overchannel (14)
data.description: Wizards are supreme magic-users, defined and united as a class by the spells they cast. Drawing on the subtle weave of magic that permeates the cosmos, wizards cast spells of explosive fire, arcing lightning, subtle deception, and brute-force mind control.
